Header.title: Professional Electrical Services
Header.paragraph: Residential, Commercial & Industrial electrical solutions. Licensed, insured, and available 24/7 for all your electrical needs across Auckland.

About.paragraph: CyberElectrix is Auckland's trusted electrical services provider, specializing in residential, commercial, and industrial electrical solutions. From simple repairs to complex smart home installations, our licensed and insured electricians deliver quality workmanship with 24/7 emergency support. We combine traditional electrical expertise with cutting-edge technology to power your modern lifestyle.

Gallery.title: Residential Panel Upgrade
Gallery.description: Complete electrical panel upgrade for Auckland family home, increasing capacity from 100A to 200A service with modern safety features.

Gallery.title: Smart Home Automation
Gallery.description: Full smart home installation featuring intelligent lighting, automated security systems, and voice-controlled devices throughout Remuera residence.

Gallery.title: Commercial Office Wiring
Gallery.description: New construction electrical installation for modern Auckland office building, including structured cabling and energy-efficient LED lighting systems.

Gallery.title: EV Charging Station Install
Gallery.description: Residential electric vehicle charging station installation with 240V Level 2 charger and smart monitoring capabilities.

Gallery.title: Solar PV System Integration
Gallery.description: Rooftop solar photovoltaic system installation with battery storage and grid-tie inverter for sustainable energy generation.

Gallery.title: Industrial Control Panel
Gallery.description: Custom control panel design and installation for manufacturing facility, featuring PLC programming and variable frequency drives.

Gallery.title: Emergency Generator Setup
Gallery.description: Standby generator installation with automatic transfer switch for critical power backup during outages at commercial facility.

Gallery.title: LED Lighting Retrofit
Gallery.description: Energy-efficient LED lighting retrofit for retail space, reducing energy consumption by 60% while improving illumination quality.

Gallery.title: Electrical Safety Inspection
Gallery.description: Comprehensive electrical safety inspection and code compliance upgrade for historic Auckland property, ensuring modern safety standards.

Services.name: General Electrical Services
Services.text: Complete electrical installations, repairs, and panel upgrades for residential, commercial, and industrial properties. From troubleshooting to new construction wiring, we handle all your electrical needs.

Services.name: 24/7 Emergency Services
Services.text: Round-the-clock emergency electrical response when you need it most. Power outages, electrical faults, and urgent repairs - our licensed electricians are ready to restore your power safely.

Services.name: Smart Home Automation
Services.text: Transform your home with intelligent lighting, smart thermostats, security systems, and voice-controlled devices. Complete smart home design and installation for modern living.

Services.name: EV Charging Solutions
Services.text: Residential and commercial electric vehicle charging station installations. From simple home chargers to complex fleet charging infrastructure, power your electric future.

Services.name: Energy Efficiency & Solar
Services.text: LED lighting retrofits, energy audits, solar PV installations, and battery storage systems. Reduce your energy costs while contributing to a sustainable future.

Services.name: Safety & Compliance
Services.text: Electrical inspections, code compliance corrections, surge protection, and safety upgrades. Ensure your electrical systems meet all safety standards and regulations.

Features.title: 24/7 Availability
Features.text: Round-the-clock emergency electrical services across Auckland. When electrical emergencies strike, we're ready to respond immediately.

Features.title: Licensed & Insured
Features.text: Fully licensed electricians with comprehensive insurance coverage. Peace of mind guaranteed with every electrical project we undertake.

Features.title: Modern Technology
Features.text: Cutting-edge electrical solutions including smart home automation, EV charging, and energy-efficient systems for the future.

Features.title: Expert Team
Features.text: Experienced electrical professionals specializing in residential, commercial, and industrial electrical systems across all sectors.
